# Aadiyan Dubey - Full Stack Developer Portfolio

> Aadiyan Dubey is a Full Stack Developer and B.Tech CSE student at NIT Nagaland, specializing in React, TypeScript, Node.js, and AI integration.

## Pages

- [Home](https://portfolio.vishwaguru.site/): Main portfolio landing page with hero section, skills orbit, and featured projects.
- [About](https://portfolio.vishwaguru.site/about): Background, education at NIT Nagaland, experience timeline, and personal bio.
- [Skills](https://portfolio.vishwaguru.site/skills): Technical skills including React, TypeScript, Node.js, Express, Supabase, and more.
- [Projects](https://portfolio.vishwaguru.site/projects): Web development projects including VishwaGuru.site and other full stack applications.
- [Certificates](https://portfolio.vishwaguru.site/certificates): Professional certifications in web development and software engineering.
- [Showcase](https://portfolio.vishwaguru.site/showcase): Creative work, interactive demos, and innovative web development experiments.
- [Contact](https://portfolio.vishwaguru.site/contact): Get in touch for web development projects, collaborations, or job opportunities.

## Optional

- [Full details](https://portfolio.vishwaguru.site/llms-full.txt): Comprehensive information about Aadiyan Dubey for AI context.
